messages.title: DON'T RISK IT – EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter how you vote locally in the Southport constituency. But just remember the opinion polls got the General Election wrong in 2015. They got the EU referendum wrong, and as Jeremy Corbyn has said himself, he was a 200-1 outside chance for the Labour leadership. So in the days of shock election results and global uncertainty, no one can ever really be sure who will win.

messages.title: BACK ME WITH YOUR VOTE HERE IN SOUTHPORT
messages.content: If you want the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain, then you must make your vote count. That is why I am asking you to back me. A vote for the Liberal Democrats, or any other party in the Southport constituency, is a wasted vote. All it will do is deliver a hung parliament and end in chaos, giving Jeremy Corbyn a route to becoming Prime Minister. So the only way to back me is by voting Conservative in your local constituency of Southport. A vote to back me is a vote for strong and stable leadership in the national interest. And your interests, too. A vote to back me is a vote to strengthen my negotiating position, to ensure we get the best Brexit deal possible. And a vote to back me is a vote to guarantee our economic security for the future. So Aline, please give me your backing and your vote. Together we can get on with the job of making life better for all of us.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest and it is central to our own security and prosperity.
Delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: So Aline, please give me your backing and your vote. Together we can get on with the job of making life better for all of us.

quotes.text: So the choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond, or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn. I pledge to you that a government where I am Prime Minister will not let you down Aline. Give me your support and I will get the best Brexit deal for you. I will stand up for you and govern for you.

examples: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
Delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
So Aline, please give me your backing and your vote. Together we can get on with the job of making life better for all of us.

Delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

So the choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond, or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter how you vote locally in the Southport constituency.
Jeremy Corbyn has said himself, he was a 200-1 outside chance for the Labour leadership.
